title: LF a rank team
body: LF rank team for rewards and just for fun, as long as win some games is fine, gold 3 atm can add my name: edisoncjx, main mid/ top /jg

replies.body:
Hey,

I was looking to form/find a team as well. I'll give you a link to my thread, let me know if you're interested!!

Cheers,

Geoff
